sen.j: 四条烏丸（しじょうからすま）は、京都府京都市下京区にある四条通と烏丸通が交わる交差点、およびその周辺の地域名である。
sen.e: Shijo karasuma is the name of the area around the crossing between Shijo-dori Street and karasuma-dori Street in Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture as well as the crossing itself.
Shijo karasuma is the name of the area around the crossing between Shijo-dori Street and Karasuma-dori Street in Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture as well as the crossing itself.
Shijo Karasuma is the name of the area around the crossing between Shijo-dori Street and Karasuma-dori Street in Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture as well as the crossing itself.

sen.j: 四条河原町から四条烏丸にかけての区域は現在の京都市の繁華街である。
sen.e: The district from Shijo Kawaramachi to Shijo karasuma is the downtown area of present Kyoto City.
The district from Shijo Kawaramachi to Shijo karasuma is the downtown area of present Kyoto City.
The district from Shijo Kawaramachi to Shijo Karasuma is the downtown area of present Kyoto City.

sen.j: 四条河原町交差点周辺が小売業中心なのに対し、四条烏丸交差点周辺は西日本を代表する金融街で、銀行や証券会社が多く、京都の金融・ビジネスの中心地となっている。
sen.e: In the area around the Shijo Kawaramachi crossing, business operations are centered on retail services, while, in the area around the Shijo karasuma crossing, many banks and securities companies are located, makiing the area one of the largest financial districts in western Japan as well as the finacial and business center of Kyoto.

In the area around the Shijo Kawaramachi crossing, business operations are centered on retail services, while, in the area around the Shijo karasuma crossing, many banks and securities companies are located, makiing the area one of the largest financial districts in western Japan as well as the finacial and business center of Kyoto.

In the area around the Shijo Kawaramachi crossing, business operations are centered on retail services, while, in the area around the Shijo Karasuma crossing, many banks and securities companies are located, making the area one of the largest financial districts in western Japan as well as the financial and business center of Kyoto.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: （かつて、京都証券取引所が置かれていたのもこの地域である。
sen.e: (In the past, Kyoto Stock Exchange was located in this area.
(In the past, Kyoto Stock Exchange was located in this area.
(In the past, Kyoto Stock Exchange was located in this area.

sen.j: 四条通沿いには河原町通から続く商店街がある。
sen.e: Along Shijo-dori Street, there is a shopping street continuing from Kawaramachi-dori street.
Along Shijo-dori Street, there is a shopping street continuing from Kawaramachi-dori street.
Along Shijo-dori Street, there is a shopping street continuing from Kawaramachi-dori street.

sen.j: 四条烏丸交差点の駅は2つある。
sen.e: Two stations are located at the Shijo Karasuma crossing.
Two stations are located at the Shijo Karasuma crossing.
Two stations are located at the Shijo Karasuma crossing.

sen.j: 四条通の地下を通る阪急電鉄阪急京都本線の駅は烏丸駅であり、烏丸通を通る京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の駅は四条駅 (京都市営地下鉄)である。
sen.e: The station on the Hankyu Kyoto Main Line of Hankyu Railway, which runs under Shijo-dori Street, is Krasuma station, and the one on the Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway, which runs under Karasuma-dori Street, is Shijo Station (of Kyoto City Subway).

The station on the Hankyu Kyoto Main Line of Hankyu Railway, which runs under Shijo-dori Street, is Krasuma station, and the one on the Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway, which runs under Karasuma-dori Street, is Shijo Station (of Kyoto City Subway).

The station on the Hankyu Kyoto Main Line of Hankyu Railway, which runs under Shijo-dori Street, is Karasuma Station, and the one on the Karasuma Line of Kyoto Municipal Subway, which runs under Karasuma-dori Street, is Shijo Station (Kyoto Municipal Subway).
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。Kyoto Municipal Subway としました。

sen.j: この2駅は互いに乗換駅でもあり、両者を区別せず四条烏丸の駅と呼ばれることもある。
sen.e: These two stations are used to switch the train lines you use, and each of them is sometimes called "a station at Shijo Karasuma" without differentiaing each other.
These two stations are used to switch train lines, and each of them is sometimes called "a station at Shijo Karasuma" without differentiaing each other.
These two stations are used to switch train lines, and each of them is sometimes called "a station at Shijo Karasuma" without differentiating each other.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: なお、交差点名は慣例として「四条烏丸」が普通の呼び方となっているが、交差点から南北へ向かった場所（烏丸通り沿線）を指す場合は「烏丸四条」（からすましじょう）と呼ぶ（通り名と呼び方の関わりについては京都市地理を参照）。
sen.e: It is customary to call the crossing as "Shijo Karasuma," but, to indicate the area in the north-south direction of the crossing, "Karasuma Shijo" is used (for how to name a street, refer to the geography of Kyoto).

It is customary to call the crossing as "Shijo Karasuma," but, to indicate the area in the north-south direction of the crossing, "Karasuma Shijo" is used (for how to name a street, refer to the geography of Kyoto).

It is customary to call the crossing as 'Shijo Karasuma,' but, to indicate the area in the north-south direction of the crossing, 'Karasuma Shijo' is used (for how to name a street, refer to the geography of Kyoto).
